summary: "One-Punch Man" is a popular Japanese superhero manga and anime series about Saitama, a hero so strong he can defeat any enemy with one punch. This superpower makes him feel bored as he craves challenging fights. The story follows his journey to find worthy opponents and make friends with other heroes. Created by One and illustrated by Yusuke Murata, it started as a webcomic in 2009 and was later remade into a digital manga and anime series. The manga has sold over 30 million copies, making it a global success.
title: One-Punch Man
